name: Hera
text:
Activate: Main
You may trash 1 of your (Homies) type Characters other than this Character and rest this Character. Set up to 1 of your [Charlotte Linlin] Characters as active.

effect.text: You may trash 1 of your (Homies) type Characters other than this Character and rest this Character. Set up to 1 of your [Charlotte Linlin] Characters as active.
